# Create feature in Product Canon

Execute the **feature** workflow as a **Functional Analyst**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_FA.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_FA.md)

## Workflow

Create Feature in Product Canon:
1. Gather feature requirements (purpose, value, scope)
2. Define personas/actors
3. Write behavior specification (implementation-agnostic)
4. Create f-PRX-NNN-description.md using template
5. Update features-index.md

## Template

Use template: `/.teamspec/templates/feature-template.md`

## Output

products/{id}/features/f-PRX-*.md
